title: Amazon Turnover Presents Organizing Challenge for Expected Alabama Election
sub_head: High churn rate limits the unionâ€™s ability to gain a foothold with employees
body:
As organizers prepare for a second unionization election at an Amazon.com Inc. warehouse in Alabama, one of the most significant challenges they face is the possibility that many people employed at the facility now may not be there when the vote is held.
Amazon has recorded turnover above 100% across many of its facilities before and during the pandemic, according to a Wall Street Journal analysis.
